name: Sketch Pad
description:
Game 2/5 for the game-a-week challenge I'm taking on. This weeks theme being find and click.

In this small game you reveal a drawing and although it is quite limited i enjoyed it's interesting aesthetic. The game's assests are made from scanned physical drawings instead of digital ones. This technique proved to be quite difficult however i think the game proves it's concept and with further refinement could become quite successful.
